greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: An infinite audioactive word, one of three in the cycle that results from the limit of the 'Look and Say' sequence using method A with an initial term of 1 (A005150).
comment: Performing 'Look and Say' once generates A087283, twice results in A087284, while three operations yield the original infinite word.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 28 2003
